name: Nethysian Ring Of Minor Spell Storing

description.text: This ring is made of several metals hammered together into a mottled pattern, with Nethys's holy symbol stamped on one end. It functions as a ring of minor spell storing, except domain spells from Nethys's domains (see page 100) count as 1 spell level lower (minimum 1st level) for the purpose of storing them in the ring.
